conflict_categories.name: Ad Blockers
conflict_categories.description: Running multiple ad blockers can slow down your browser, consume more resources, and cause websites to display incorrectly or break entirely.
conflict_categories.recommended_action: Keep only one active ad blocker. Disable or remove others to ensure optimal performance and website compatibility.

conflict_categories.name: VPN Services
conflict_categories.description: Activating multiple VPN extensions simultaneously can lead to network conflicts, unstable connections, IP address leaks, or significantly reduced browsing speed.
conflict_categories.recommended_action: Use only one VPN extension at a time. If you need different VPN services, ensure only one is enabled when in use.

conflict_categories.name: Shopping Coupon Finders
conflict_categories.description: Multiple coupon extensions may override each other's functionality, preventing you from automatically applying the best available deals or causing checkout issues.
conflict_categories.recommended_action: Choose your preferred coupon extension and disable or remove others. You can always enable another if a specific deal requires it.

conflict_categories.name: Tab Managers
conflict_categories.description: Using several tab management extensions can lead to conflicts in organizing, suspending, or restoring tabs, potentially resulting in lost sessions or unexpected tab behavior.
conflict_categories.recommended_action: Select one primary tab manager that best suits your workflow and keep it active. Disable or remove redundant ones.

conflict_categories.name: Proxy/Network Controllers
conflict_categories.description: Multiple extensions attempting to control network proxy settings or modify network requests can cause severe connectivity issues, internet instability, or expose your browsing data.
conflict_categories.recommended_action: Only one network or proxy control extension should be active at any given time to prevent network disruptions and security risks.

conflict_categories.name: Screenshot/Screen Recorders
conflict_categories.description: Using more than one screenshot or screen recording tool may lead to hotkey conflicts, unexpected capture behavior, or resource contention, slowing down your system.
conflict_categories.recommended_action: Stick to one primary screenshot or screen recording tool to avoid conflicts and ensure reliable functionality.

conflict_categories.name: Password Managers
conflict_categories.description: Activating multiple password manager extensions can cause auto-fill conflicts, duplicate entries, data synchronization issues, or even create security vulnerabilities if not managed carefully.
conflict_categories.recommended_action: It is highly recommended to use only one password manager extension to avoid data corruption, auto-fill errors, and potential security gaps.

deprecated_extensions.name: The Great Suspender (Original)
deprecated_extensions.reason: This extension was removed from the Chrome Web Store due to reports of malware and malicious activity. It poses a significant security risk.
deprecated_extensions.recommended_action: Immediately uninstall this extension. It is unsafe to keep installed.

deprecated_extensions.name: Honey
deprecated_extensions.reason: While popular, some versions or behaviors of this extension have been reported as potentially problematic, including data collection practices or aggressive pop-ups. Review its permissions carefully.
deprecated_extensions.recommended_action: Review its permissions and consider if you are comfortable with its data access. Browser-built-in features or other reputable alternatives might offer similar functionality with fewer concerns.

alternatives.name: Browser's built-in coupon features (e.g., Chrome's Shopping)

deprecated_extensions.name: SaveFrom.net Helper
deprecated_extensions.reason: This extension has been associated with adware, unwanted software, and potential privacy issues. It often modifies search results or injects ads.
deprecated_extensions.recommended_action: Uninstall this extension. Use official platform features or well-vetted, reputable download tools for media.

alternatives.name: Reputable video download software (search for trusted options)

deprecated_extensions.name: Web of Trust (WOT)
deprecated_extensions.reason: Previously faced significant privacy concerns regarding user browsing data collection and sale. Although newer versions claim improvements, caution is still advised due to its history.
deprecated_extensions.recommended_action: Consider using built-in browser security features or alternative, transparent security extensions.
